name: com.heathen.steamworksfoundation
description: The free lite version of Heathen's Toolkit for Steamworks SDK; A powerful set of tools, systems and editor extensions to make your integration with the Steam API easier, faster, and more robust. Make the most of Steam for your game!

samples.description: Unity uGUI Prefabs to help you prototype common use cases faster!.
A simple example scene that demonstrates the use of Steamworks most common and widely used features
